website_summaries.verdict: With its range of color options, this Nestl bed skirt is hard to beat.
pros: A simple bed skirt with pleated corners for a clean and crisp look
If you need something to match your bedroom's decor, this skirt's color options have something for any room
cons: The fabric is on the thin side and may wear out quickly

customer_reviews.title: Literally fell apart...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it has anything to do with our climate here in Hawaii, but this is what happened to the material that held the fabric of the skirt together. It literally disintegrated. It took about a year for it to get this bad, but still... It was under a matress and wasn't exposed to any kind of sunlight, moisture, or other destructive elements.
customer_reviews.author: RyanB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bed Skirt in Style & Color
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed skirt! Really beautiful gray color that looks nice with our bedding. Pleats lay nicely, easy to iron. The material is very soft. Would definitely recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: This was the the bed skirt I have been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the picture of the bed skirt, I was a bit concerned because it looked a bit stiff, and I really wanted something a little softer. Well, I got just what I wanted!! I really like this bed skirt and I will probably be ordering another one in a different color for my 2nd bedroom. The color is exactly as shown in the picture. I was also looking for the type of bed skirt that fits between the mattress and box spring - not the elastic kind that wraps around the box spring. This was a great find for me and the price was right!
customer_reviews.author: J. Process

customer_reviews.title: Great product, excellent packaging, superb price :)
customer_reviews.text: I love the deep grey color! The material was of nice quality that made for little ironing right out of the package.Attached is a picture of how I customized it to match my current decor. Combined with the matching 1500 Supreme Collection Bed Sheets it made for a great base to a new look! Great product, excellent packaging, superb price :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Placed in the dryer on low like the tag reads and the white fabric completely melted ...
customer_reviews.text: I took this skirt out of the package and washed it before putting it on my bed. Placed in the dryer on low like the tag reads and the white fabric completely melted together. I had to tear it apart to try and get it on my bed and there are now holes in the white fabric. Good thing that is covered by the mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Wiljanen

customer_reviews.title: Great bedskirt, as pictured and arrived quickly!
customer_reviews.text: This bedskirt is an elegant silvery grey color. It arrived quickly and in good packaging. It was a little wrinkly, as expected when shipping bedding, but after a quick iron, it was perfect. It looks lovely and the seller has even followed up to ensure it arrived and met my expectations. If you're looking for a neutral-colored but elegant bed skirt, this is a great value. I have 2 black cats that go in and out under the bed, and it hasn't even picked up their fur!
customer_reviews.author: Katja

customer_reviews.title: a throne of lies
customer_reviews.text: Never have I ever received something so cheap and sh*tty despite so many glowing product reviews. The skirt material was adequate but the material that goes between the bed and box spring is a glorified paper towel. The tiniest tug to readjust the positioning of it tore a massive 2 foot rip. This is not a case of me not knowing my own strength. Seriously, I've encountered thicker and more durable toilet paper.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this bed skirt. The fabric has a nice feel and hangs nicely once on the bed. I was pleased with the fabric of the cover that goes between the mattress and foundation piece. Sometimes those can be really chintzy and rip easily. That does not seem to be the issue with this product. Very happy with it. should I need another bed skirt I would be very likely to repurchase this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Fan

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR SUPPORTING FABRIC
customer_reviews.text: The supporting fabric is paper...who would EVER design something with paper fabric that gets shifted, pulled and stretched on a regular basis???? Jot worth even the low price. Save for the higher quality...my biggest problem was the color is Awesome and no other company has the dark eggplant purple so I took a risk and its been more frustrating to have it on my bed than to go without one. 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Just keeping businesses honest with truthful reviews

customer_reviews.title: Tears in less than a month.
customer_reviews.text: This bedskirt is terrible!!! Going straight off of the items description: "MADE FROM DURABLE MATERIAL" "WELL-TAILORED AND STRUCTURED" This is completely untrue. My item has been used on a new bed, less than a month and already the entire right side has 3 separate tears in it. The price on this truly reflects the quality. The color is nice, the fabric was nice, but wear quality is bad. Bed skirts need to be made built to last because they to get a lot of tug and pull from beds naturally,these shouldn't have holes after 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: You may want to iron this..or not
customer_reviews.text: I received the brown bedskirt this morning and immediately started wrestling with my queen sized mattress to put this on. Needless to say I am grateful that I don't have a king sized mattress. I do not own an iron so I knew it would not have a crisp look but I'm a casual gal so I deal with it. The skirt is a soft fabric and the top (the part that covers the top of the box spring) is a stiffer fabric that is also easy to manipulate. This does graze the floor which is cool with me. I am a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: M.ScottTop Contributor: Fragrance

customer_reviews.title: Color Okay, but Too Thin
customer_reviews.text: These bed skirts were the right color, but they appear to be made of a very thin polyester material (think kid's Halloween costume quality, but not as shiny). This means that the box spring outline and/or items stored under the bed may be visible. Also note that (as described) they are not split at the corners, so they will gap up there unless your bed does not have a footboard. Because this color is harder to find and because I am skilled at sewing, I plan to line and to alter them, but others may find them unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Austen Fan

customer_reviews.title: It was great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to finally get new bed skirting and here we are looking all frumpy. The grey part has ripped from the white part and it is just devastating. This is equally as embarrassing as ripping your pants. Who wants to see a naked box spring?! Not me. Needless to say we are no longer high class citizens and we are really disappointed in this investment. If you are looking for something long term (Like more than a month) I wouldn't consider this option, it will leaving you feeling torn apart.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Ginter

customer_reviews.title: Don"t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I guess the old saying you get what you pay for is true. This bedskirt is not worth buying. The part of the item that lays on top of the box springs seems to be made of some type of PAPER...not material. I washed it on gentle, cold water, etc. and dried it according to the directions (which I could barely read!} It ripped in several places and I had to iron the "skirt" portion because it was so wrinkled. If the color (yellow) wasn't so hard to find, this item would have been in the garbage. I hate writing this kind of review, but my experience needed to be told.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Lousy quality, didn't fit and NOT tailored or smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely not what is shown or advertised. It does not fit my full bed, it is NOT good quality material and it is NOT tailored well at all, even if I were to starch and iron and it certainly needs to be, as it arrived more wrinkled than I care to joke about. Ridiculous! Now I have to go through the trouble of repackaging and I will have to shop when I have a million things to do before guests arrive because I won't have time to order another one. So tired of sellers being able to LIE about their products. Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Alves

customer_reviews.title: careful
customer_reviews.text: Being I didn't have a 2nd set of hands to help me getting this between the mattress & box spring was a challenge. Ideally the mattress should come off, the ruffle put on, the mattress put back on. But that was no possible for me. So in the process of trying to get the ruffle in place i guess I pulled a little too hard and the base fabric tore. Like most ruffles this fabric is not very sturdy. I suppose if they used an actual sheet instead it would increase the price but it would make it more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Ldep

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Inaccurate color.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this dust ruffle is just wrong. The Cream color pictured in the photo is more of an light vanilla-yellow. The material is VERY flimsy so there is no way to lay this on the bed and get the crisp look that appears in the photo. The pleated corner look shown in the photo is impossible to achieve no matter how much starch I used. I wish I had returned this item. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Erie Lady

customer_reviews.title: Was exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This bed skirt was perfect for what we wanted! I measured the distance from the top of the box spring to the floor, searched on Amazon for a skirt with that exact drop and this worked out perfect! It hangs just to the floor, the straightness (my preference over the ruffled look) was great, and it looks good! Added bonus: our cat loves the hidey hole it created under the bed... but we also now know where she's hiding when she's in a bit of trouble. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sally M.

customer_reviews.title: ... navy blue queen size dust ruffle and was very pleased with the both products
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a chocolate brown and navy blue queen size dust ruffle and was very pleased with the both products. They fit the beds perfectly, and looked so nice under the quilts. I couldn't find dust ruffles in the stores so I bought them online through Amazon from a company called Nestl Bedding and I would definitely order from them again. Excellent product, Great Price, and Wonderful Customer Service. They have contacted me several times to make sure I was satisfied with my product. Wish all businesses were this caring. I give them an A+++++.
customer_reviews.author: K. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why some reviewers complain about wrinkles and poor quality over all. When unpacked, the bed skirt was indeed wrinkled as would be most fabrics folded several times. But it is expected. Ironing (steaming) takes care of the wrinkles (not a big deal). The quality of the product is very much acceptable considering the price we paid. The bed skirt sits well on the bed and looks presentable. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mishutka

customer_reviews.title: Great Look For The Price
customer_reviews.text: So far I have purchased 3 of the Nestl Bedding Pleated Skirts (Queen) and all for the same bed. Each is a different color and gives me the ability to easily switch them out for the season. The skirt is well made, even though it feels light. The seams are strongly reinforced. The fall from the boxspring is nice and adds the right look to my bed and bedroom. I highly recommend due to the color variety and price. It's affordable and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: WondirectorTop Contributor: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Incorrectly sized.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my California King size bed. Dimensions of my bed are 72” head to foot and 84” side to side. The bed skirt was over 6” short in width! I double checked the tag to see if they accidentally sent me a queen size bed skirt. But the tag said CaliKing. SO disappointing. SO frustrating. SO inconvenient because I had to remove my huge mattress from my bed frame to put the bed skirt on, only to find it didn’t fit. I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Green

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bed skirt for a great price
customer_reviews.text: The product did arrive wrinkled - but it's in a plastic bag, what would you expect?! I did iron it to smooth out the wrinkles and it turned out great. It lies flat, is a beautiful color, and is very soft (although it's a bed skirt, so I don't know why softness matters). Anyway, for the price - it is perfect. Exactly as pictured and hides all the crap we have stashed under our bed. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Renee B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, came with tear
customer_reviews.text: Very bummed, I loved the color of the slate gray with our room. We got a new bedroom set and when we were setting everything up we noticed a big tear on the seam of this bed skirt. We didn’t even get the chance to use this. For now we will live without a bed skirt lol. You what you pay for I guess! Would not recommend this product :/
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great Bedskirt, Good Value for the Money!!  (Does Have Wrinkles, though)
customer_reviews.text: I was looking all over town for a bedskirt in the right color of blue to go in my child's room, and I could never find one. I finally turned to Amazon and found this great blue bedskirt, and it turned out to be the perfect color of blue to go in the room. Although this bed-skirt is not "wrinkle free", it certainly serves its purpose and hide the very ugly boxspring and bedframe underneath. Overall, I am very happy with my purchase! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: amulet

customer_reviews.title: After ironing it's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This product is NOT wrinkle free. I had to iron it multiple times after washing to get it to look acceptable. That being said, it's not a bad bedskirt. The pleating on the edges is very flattering and tasteful. The length is perfect for my pillowtop queen mattress. It was relatively easy to put on and it has remained in place for months. Great value for the money. If you're willing to iron for a while, it's totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren L.

customer_reviews.title: Keep your expectations realistic
customer_reviews.text: This is a $17 (King) bed skirt. With that understanding, it's fine. It requires ironing after removal from the package (no easy task). After that, it actually looks decent. Not crisp and tailored like the pictures, but decent. Mine was the size advertised, so fits quite well. I see no way this would ever hold up to washing. Consider it disposable. Material is very light, so don't expect crisp clean pleats and flat hems. If I spent $45+ for it, I'd be unhappy. For $17, I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: D. Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This skirt was ok for the money, but I will be looking for another. Unfortunately when I was ironing the skirt (it is NOT wrinkle free) I hit the liner in a few places with the iron and I know the skirt will fall apart when I go to wash it since the liner melted into huge holes even though I only hit it for a brief moment. The skirt and liner is a very cheap, thin material. Good for a guest or child’s room.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H.

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality (according to someone who never bought a bed skirt).
customer_reviews.text: So I finally bought a nice new mattress and wanted to dress it up a bit, but I never bought a bed skirt before. This one seems cheap. The material is very thin, arrived wrinkled, and it doesn't iron well (yes, I tried). I placed it under the mattress and it looks nothing like the picture used to advertise it - no crisp lines, no "neat" look. It does look like I tired to get away with using just a thin flat sheet... In fairness, if all bed skirts are this thin and can't be ironed - then I change my review to "meets expectations."
customer_reviews.author: David! Wilkens

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT IS GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like the picture. It's cheap fabric. A wrinkled mess. You can see through it and the seams aren't even sewn together in some places. I tried to return the item, but have to pay postage to get it back, which in my case, was going to be $15.10. PS I'd bet dollars to donuts most of these positive reviews have been paid to leave them. BUYER BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: We had a white pottery barn bed skirt for about 15 years, and the only reason I replaced it was because it was yellowing from old age. I wasn't sure about going to a dark color so I didn't want to spend a lot, but you get what you pay for. This thing isn't going to last 18 months. It's ok if you change your bedding often, but bad if you want it to hold up a while.
customer_reviews.author: WallyFam

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the cost
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice skirt for the value. I had one problem... I wanted burgundy and I ordered burgundy but the color really is a dark red. I kept it anyway. Of course you have to iron it when it comes out of the package. Do not iron the middle section. I'm mentioning this because I read other reviews in regards to it being wrinkled. :) Nice bed skirt for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen O

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkled and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This bedskirt came out of the package super wrinkly. I washed and dried this bedskirt per the instructions and it is just as wrinkled as before. It says not to iron, so I don’t know how else to get the wrinkles out. It is a super thin, flimsy material and does not look like the neat, tailored material in the picture. Returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: TheJoge

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for...
customer_reviews.text: You can't argue the value for what I paid for. But when I got the product. I noticed one of the pillow cases was of a different material. In addition, the other pillow case had a defect. It was not sewn correctly and there was a hole. There was a once inch hole. I ended up sewing it up as oppose to returning it as it was too much of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: CNN

customer_reviews.title: Thin and disappointing
customer_reviews.text: We put this under our Queen mattress in our guest bedroom. Found it to be very disappointing, the material in the middle is so thin that just adjusting it, once the mattress was on, caused it to rip away from the skirt. Now I am left to shop for another one before my company arrives. It does NOT look like the picture they show.
customer_reviews.author: GailB

customer_reviews.title: Great Price!  Great Product!  Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: Great Price, Great Product! Our mattress was used by several well-loved cats (who have since passed on due to old age) as a scratching post! We could not afford to replace the mattress, but this bed ruffle was perfect! It was easy to install, fit perfectly, looked great, and best of all, covered the damage! It also appears that it will launder well. I heartily recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and soft! I bought the navy blue color. It matches my other navy blue bedding perfectly. Its a durable fabric and won't fall apart in the wash. I used the lowest heat setting when drying and 99% of the wrinkles were gone. I have a king size bed and the king skirt fits just right. I'm very pleased with this purchase and would recommend to anyone looking for a nice bed skirt under $20.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Thin Material
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to return this product. While attempting to put the skirt on my boxsprings it ripped along the seems at the corner. For the price it was not surprising. If your looking for a skirt for a full or twin bed, this is the product to buy. But for anything bigger you need to put in the money to receive the quality for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Cowart

customer_reviews.title: Too lightweight, and center part of the bedskirt is cheap non woven interfacing material
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this purchase. The fabric weight was too lightweight for what I was looking for and worst of all the center portion of the skirt (the part that goes under the mattress) is this cheap non woven material that will melt under high heat iron and will easily tear if pulled too hard which unfortunately tends to happen when your adjusting your bedskirt. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: vivi

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to cover up the bed frame but didn't want a bunch of ruffles for an old geezer like me. This fit the bill. Tossed the bed skirt into the dryer for 10 minutes with a sheet of fabric softener. Came out looking like it had not been folded up in a tight package. For an old Navy Vet, this is as close to home as you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not very strong
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bed skirt. But adjusting your mattress and if it moves, that’s it. The bed skirt is done when trying to adjust it again. You cannot tug on the skirt to readjust because it’s not very thick or heavy (sewn in). This would be easy to put on and steam on a twin or full maybe. But on my Queen it was kind of difficult and I can’t even imagine a King. Good luck
customer_reviews.author: Devin Persaud

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: The bed skirt arrived very wrinkled, which is to be expected. But I mention that because the material it’s made of is very fragile, so be careful with it. Use a cool iron setting to avoid burning it, and be careful when tucking the bedding under the mattress. Mine tore right away. Other than that, it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Unstable.  Looks tacky.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot keep this thing in place. It looks like it’s been ripped or torn up, but only because it’s so difficult to keep in place. Wouldn’t bother with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this yellow bedskirt and paired with recommended pillow shams. I used them with a quilt my grandmother made about 25 years ago and it's beautiful. As expected, the skirt was wrinkled but a steamer and about 15 minutes did the trick. The material is soft but hangs nicely and the price was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry D

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous all around
customer_reviews.text: So many of the other bed skirts had awful reviews. This one was the only one I could find with all good ones and they were right. I bought the white, washed and dried it and put it on the bed without ironing. But you have to get it out of the dryer immediately. And the price was unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: ARLENE

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: It's great. Just what I needed. A tumble in the dryer (in lieu of ironing) did the trick to get out the wrinkles from how it was packed. Color is true to the online photo. And my room feels just that much more put together. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap in a lot of areas.
customer_reviews.text: The outside visible area looks ok but the top is supercheap feels like a dried up disposable wet wipe. That part also tears up very easy just like you would expect from a dry wet-wipe. I still use it, the bed looks better than without it, its just really easy to tear
customer_reviews.author: Vahe Aslanyan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap poor and not worth the savings.
customer_reviews.text: This was cheap and IS cheap, but not worth the deal. ***Poor, poor, poor*** Very thin cheap fabric. Terribly wrinkled. (Thought if I washed on cold gentle and partially dried it would be better.... not. It was still wrinkled. Ironed skirt and looks okay, but still thin and cheap. (Don’t let iron touch the poor webbing type box spring fabric covering ... it will melt/damage). Note: I should not have washed and tried to salvage order. Should have returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Recon

customer_reviews.title: Caution: Iron only LOWEST setting.
customer_reviews.text: The skirt needed to be ironed but the white top melted when touched with my iron, which must have been too hot. So I was careful to avoid that area after melting a corner. I love the color and it blends well with my bedspread so I will keep it and probably patch the area I melted.
customer_reviews.author: Rita W

customer_reviews.title: Quality fabric and classic design
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this bedskirt. I don't always like microfiber products, so I ordered with some skepticism to take advantage of the price--I just needed a white bedskirt after all. But the fabric is a good weight and softness, and ironed beautifully (I think it is to be expected that it would need ironing after shipping). It fits my queen-sized bed perfectly and comes exactly to the floor. The pleats lay nicely and look neat at the corners. Overall, this is a good quality product at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Wisteria

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad that there are companies that make bedding in the California King size. Sometimes they are hard to find, especially in a variety of colors. The dust ruffle is the perfect shade of gray for what I needed. Not too dark or too light. It was wrinkled right out of the package but was easy to press. I haven't washed it yet so I can't comment on that. It fits the bed perfectly and it arrived quickly. The fabric is neither too thin or too heavy. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: The color was exactly as I needed. for a guest bedroom. The bed skirt came extremely wrinkled, but that was ok. Washed it on a gentle cycle and wrinkle free dry cycle. I steamed the wrinkles out, and had no tears when putting it on the box spring. I do wish the skirt would have been slightly longer, but it will do.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfy and easy care bed linens.
customer_reviews.text: The bedskirt is a perfect color match for the duvet cover we bought, and it really ties our whole room together. The fabric is soft and cuddly, and washes easily and dries quickly. It came out with one or two faint wrinkles from being folded in the packaging, but I'm sure the second wash will be as smooth as the duvet cover is. I'm very happy with my NESTL bedding set!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is way too thin!
customer_reviews.text: This bedskirt has very soft fabric, however is way too thin! You can see your bed frame through it! ( you can see your hand through it) It was not very expensive, I suppose you get what you pay for. Unfortunately, I it was 12 days after my return period before I was ready to use it, so I’m glad it was not expensive...
customer_reviews.author: Dleop

customer_reviews.title: A Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: The fabric of this bedskirt is so flimsy, that when you try to make the bed, just putting on a fitted sheet and trying to tuck in a flat sheet messes the entire bedskirt up. Sometimes inexpensive items are nice to find, but this goes the other way and turns into a total waste of money since now I'll have to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Marjica

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bedskirt for about two months now. I purchased it because the one I had previously and my king-size bed had ripped due to wear and I needed to replace it for guests coming into town. I have a king size bed and the measurements work to hide items under the bed fine. I do notice that there is a little bit of white that shows beyond the mattress that I am sometimes tucking in, But other than that so far so good on this product.
customer_reviews.author: maggiegypsy

customer_reviews.title: Slip and slide
customer_reviews.text: The navy blue color was just as advertised, it fit the bed as expected and looked good, but I noticed my mattress had started to shift.......every night! The material on the top of the bed skirt apparently didn't mesh well with my mattress 🥴 if you purchase this item be sure to iron it before putting it on the bed but do not iron the top part that goes over the mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Bedskirt
customer_reviews.text: The bed skirt seems alright but it tore at the stitching a little bit as we were trying to lay it down. That was a let down because it wasn't pulled very hard. It is soft which is nice and I do see wrinkles which isn't very much. All in all it's not bad, just not
customer_reviews.author: Rose Draw

customer_reviews.title: A skirt you can't look under.
customer_reviews.text: I slipped this skirt over my box spring, the day my bed was delivered, and it almost looked ready for Prom! The Skirt is soft, truly wrinkle free, and the perfect length for my 7" something high bed. Standard height from the floor, we'll say. The Skirt doesn't bunch up on the floor, collecting dust, but hangs just long enough to not touch, yet long enough to hide any stored items one may have underneath one's bed. It's a skirt that leaves enough for the imagination, while remaining tasteful and classy. Any bed would be proud to wear this product. If I were to get more beds in the future, or replace one, I would absolutely purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C.

customer_reviews.title: Light colors will be see-through
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the baby blue and it was true to color, but the material is very thin and is extremely wrinkled out of the package. Since it's 100% polyester, you can't iron it (it will melt). I think this would be ok if you are going with a dark color, but be aware of the lighter colors. I have a light-colored mattress, and it still looked bad. It's a cheap bedskirt and you're getting what you pay for. I returned mine due to the thinness and the wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Rips easily! Cheap material!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. The middle part of the bedskirt, that goes under the mattress is made of a cheap fabric that rips like paper. Ours was ripped at the seam of this material and the skirt material. I am returning mine and am on the hunt for a better quality version.
customer_reviews.author: April Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: This looks nothing like the photo! The photo makes the bed skirt appear to be of a heavy cloth- not so. The cloth is so thin you can practically see through it. It looks like a crappy sheet hanging off the bed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and simple.
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for the price. I bought this for my daughters room. The color is a tad bit off from the picture. It’s not soft at all but it’s a skirt not a sheet so I didn’t need it to feel soft. It had some wrinkles in it but was able to get them out with a steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Reidy

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Fabric was not as thick as I expected. Even after ironing it doesn't hang as nice as it looks in the advertisement. We bought it for a vacation rental and have now removed it because it easily slips when making the bed. Not what I expected. Might work well on a guest bed you are not using very often.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Gerbig

customer_reviews.title: It's a bedskirt...
customer_reviews.text: That is all. I needed something cheap to cover up a new bed frame and couldn't find one with a flat "top"; most are elastic now, which is awesome, but not practical on the new combo bed frame/boxspring bases. It arrived slightly wrinkled, but after about 24 hours of hanging, the wrinkles fell out. As for softness, I didn't rub it against my face and I'm not sleeping on it, so I can't speak to it. Again, it's a bedskirt, but definitely functional and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle Block

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these! Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy these! Very cheaply made. The part that goes under the mattress feels like paper. I would return both for a refund but it’s past the time. I bought them for our beach house and went down this weekend to put them on the beds and ended up not using them. Went to the store and bought better quality ones. Don’t buy these!
customer_reviews.author: tclark523

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My two twin beds need a skirt because the box springs didn’t match and they weren’t attractive. I founds these to work great. Good price point, we’ll made, and easy to put on. They came out wrinkled but I put them in the dryer for a few minutes with a soft damp cloth and the wrinkles came right out.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Almost wrinkle free
customer_reviews.text: When you take it out of the package is is quite wrinkled. I put it into the dryer on low and wrinkle free for 20 minutes. Most of the wrinkles came out. I did put it on the bed. Looks okay. Hopefully, the rest of the wrinkles will come out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already ripped after a few days use..
customer_reviews.text: It came pretty wrinkled. Color is as described. Problem is the white fabric portion on top is so thin and fragile that it already ripped from trying to slide it in place with the mattress. It's a cheap bed skirt but unhappy that it's already ripped. It'll probably not last more than a year..
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Updated review! I purchased this Dust Ruffle on 2/11/16. Yes, it was nice and all when I got it, but it started to tear only a few months after putting it onto the bed. This month it has totally separated from the mattress cover. I guess it would still be in pristine condition had I had never changed my sheets and tucked them in between the mattresses. Spend another $25 to replace this dust ruffle? Never.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Flanigan

customer_reviews.title: Nestl bedding pleated bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase from this buyer. I would recommend anyone to buy from this buyer. The product is as described in the product and fits like it should. Very satisfied with my bed skirt.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bedskirt
customer_reviews.text: This bedskirt looks perfect on my bed with the new quilt I purchased. I washed it and put it in the dryer hoping the packaging wrinkles would fall out but hat did not work so I had to iron it. Other than that I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: threehounds

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality of the skirt, considering the extremely reasonable price. It feels soft, the wrinkles ironed out very quickly and easily. It hangs beautifully and looks very nice on the bed. It really completes the look of the bed and room. I will be ordering more for our other guest bed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Beauchemin

customer_reviews.title: The dimensions were just right.
customer_reviews.text: Material wasn't quite as heavy or thick as I had hoped, however, as someone else reported you get what you pay for. And I did think the price was very reasonable. It was terribly wrinkled from packaging but ironed out fine. Have only had a few days so will see how it works out but for most part I feel it is worth the reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: new friend Kay

customer_reviews.title: Like this, but one drawback
customer_reviews.text: The drawback for me is the flimsy material that connects the bed skirt (the part that lays over the box springs). It is impossible to keep in place without pinning it to the box springs, but when you do, the material immediately tears. But this company is not alone in this flaw. I would love to see something truly durable.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Thin Microfiber. Not Structured
customer_reviews.text: The picture makes this seem like it's a structured and thick material but it's actually very thin and flowy microfiber. Also, when I put it over the box spring, I noticed there was a small hole already on the bedskirt. I really can't be bothered to take it off since my mattress weighs a ton so I am keeping it until I find a better quality and more structured material.
customer_reviews.author: BookHigh

customer_reviews.title: Dust ruffle!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color and perfect fit! Tip: If your mattress is extra heavy, get two people and 'LIFT' the mattress onto the frame! I wasn't so smart and slid it onto the frame and tried to adjust the dust ruffle after?!?! I tore a hole in the skirting by tugging too hard with a heavy mattress and memory foam topper sitting on it! 😞 Next time I'll know better, but the 'rip' is hidden anyway, only I know that it is there!
customer_reviews.author: antdoy

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and low quality.
customer_reviews.text: The dust ruffle itself was soft, but a very thin fabric. The top piece of fabric, which holds the whole thing together, was extremely thin and paper-like. I felt like it was going to tear simply by putting it on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 under 2

customer_reviews.title: Barely worth it
customer_reviews.text: I spent way too much time to iron out the wrinkles and it still didn’t look right. The material is then. It has nobody to it. And I needed it so I kept it. But I know it’s going to be replaced shortly. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: MDH

customer_reviews.title: Very thin fabric
customer_reviews.text: It is super thin fabric. Almost silky feeling. So In the package it is very wrinkled. Which is why my rate is so low on that. I did have to iron it which is a chore in itself. Once done and on the bed it is a nice bed skirt. For the price it looks great with my comforter.
customer_reviews.author: BrianW

customer_reviews.title: Love the Fabric!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed skirt with the hope that it would match a comforter quilt set that I had also purchased on Amazon. It was perfect - and I LOVE the tailored look. No ruffles and it hangs beautifully. I used the pins that are made to hold it in place to ensure that it doesn't droop or slide when you are changing sheets, etc. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Spears

customer_reviews.title: As designed...
customer_reviews.text: It's a bedskirt... Nothing to get too excited about or need details on how it works. I ordered Navy - it is Navy. I ordered queen size - it fits just right. Looks good on the bed. Satisfied with the quality and packaging. Good to go on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good bedskirt!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice bedskirt, only problem is my Dad was helping me put it on my bed and he tugged on it slightly to reposition it and it immediately ripped the fabric part of the sheet away from the white fabric part that you don’t see. Once in a while it starts to slip down and you see the rip but, I just safety pinned it together and poke it back under the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Working well, we liked the many color options and it is a pretty good length for the bed, as we do not have it on a frame and the box spring is just sitting right on the floor-- not too much extra fabric draped onto the floor. It isn't quite as flat and perfectly folded in the corners as pictured but still does the job
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Dobratz

customer_reviews.title: Quality not the best
customer_reviews.text: From the picture is looked firm, hangs easily. When it arrived it is cheap and flimsy. I am afraid to iron it, as it might get burned. It's like a micro fabric vs cotton. I kept it, only because I needed it for company.. but I will be looking for one of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Love the color , very wrinkled. It’s been on my bed for 2 weeks now and still very wrinkled need to get the steamer out ! I would suggest putting it in the dryer for 5 minutes before placing it on the bed !
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with the quality of the box spring cover. The skirt needs to be ironed after opening. I accidentally caught the white box spring cover with the iron and it melted instantly leaving a whole right at the edge where the skirt attaches. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Sue Trigger

customer_reviews.title: Nice and long
customer_reviews.text: The XL twin size Pleated Bed Skirt hangs long enough on both sides of the bed to block the view under the bed and the pleats adds class to the style of the bed. I am a little disappointed in the fabric that goes under the mattress but by using caution I was able to fit the skirt without tearing the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: MS Southern

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: One false move, like if your foot catches it, or if you accidentally tug on it while making or changing your bed, the skirt tears away from the netting. I selected this particular bedskirt because of the color selection - I bought a cream one and a gold one. The colors are pretty and what I expected from the pictures, but both have ripped away from the box spring. I would not recommend purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height, great color match to their sheets
customer_reviews.text: It looks so much better than the ugly metal frame. Ok, so ours isn't on perfectly, but the bad parts are against a wall. It was a heavy mattress and I was doing it myself. The parts that show are both soft and an almost perfect match to the Nestl grey and grey with stripe sheeting.
customer_reviews.author: Jeneva Samples

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It isn’t a tailored bed skirt. It is a normal bed skirt. The material is thin and doesn’t retain its shape. I was expecting a full tailored skirt the went over the entire bed frame rather than just 3 sides.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t look like the photos
customer_reviews.text: The bed skirt in the sales image and the actual skirt you get look TOTALLY different. I figured this would be a nice and thick bed skirt, instead I got a thin one that looks nothing as advertised. And then the corners of the skirt don’t fit on a twin day bed frame, so I had to cut the corners just so it could fit. Overall disappointed with the product. This could have been avoided if the product was just advertised like it actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Thin material lacks crispness
customer_reviews.text: Very thin material and lacks the crispness seen in photo. We kept it because we didn't feel like taking the bed apart twice to replace it. You get what you pay for in quality. Length to floor is good though. Serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: cmwagen

customer_reviews.title: Very see-through
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a guest bedroom in white. After maneuvering the king mattress off to put the bedskirt on over the box springs and then sliding the mattress back on, I noticed that the material of the skirt is very thin. So thin I could see the box spring behind it, pink with all the mfg logos. For me this completely defeated the purpose of having a skirt which is to hide the box springs and frame.
customer_reviews.author: Kris W

customer_reviews.title: Great bedskirt and will stay in place!
customer_reviews.text: My dislike is more about me than the bedskirt because 1. I love that it isn’t one of those with elastic to hold it up because they never stay in place BUT 2. I have a king mattress and it’s a real back breaking chore to get this in place but it’s so nice after you accomplish that task! It looks really nice!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Francis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to match my comforter because the dust ruffle that came with it had deteriorated. This one is almost an exact color match and the fabric is very nice. It ironed up very easily and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: legalois

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate color
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the color; it is not at all as pictured. I ordered the light blue that is pictured a nice turquoise/aqua color but it was so light/pale it is practically just a blueish white! Very subtle color that doesn't work for me. Shame to have to waste my time because of an inaccurate image. The quality, however, seems decent and it would have been just what I was looking for if the color was correct.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with quality, fit and stitching
customer_reviews.text: Stitching is way off. It’s much bigger than the frame and I had to iron the whole thing. Cheap super thin material but it’s a pain getting it under a king alone hence the only reason I’m not returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Klaudia

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I got for my granddaughter. She was happy with it. It tried to eat my iron, so beware. I couldn’t get the heat setting low enough to keep it from sticking. The iron cost a lot more than the bedskirt. G
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Odell

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged with a black brown crust, over top of the skirt. Pretty disgusting, especially during this covid crisis. Washed the skirt and it held up nicely, letting the wrinkles naturally fall out. Very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Lanae

product_meta.title: Nestl Bedding Bed Skirt - Soft Double Brushed Premium Microfiber Dust Ruffle - Luxury Pleated Dust Ruffle, Hotel Quality Sleek Modern Bed Skirt, Easy Fit with 14 in Tailored Drop, Queen, Light Orange
feature_bullets: QUEEN SIZE: Queen size bed skirt measures 60 x 80 inches (152 x 203 cm) with a 14” tailored drop for a crisp, finished look. This beautifully tailored, pleated bed skirt is also available in Twin, Twin XL, Full, Full XL and California King sizes.

PREMIUM HIGH-QUALITY MATERIAL: Nestl Bed Skirts are woven from high-quality, 100 GSM brushed microfiber material, resulting in a strong, durable, long-lasting material. Our bed skirts are heavy enough to stay in place, yet light enough to allow natural movement so they never look or feel stiff! Smooth and pleated, the Nestl Bed Skirt adds clean, modern style to your bedroom.

ELEGANT AND VIBRANT: Place the Nestl Bed Skirt between your mattress and box spring for a beautiful, elegant way to update your bedroom décor! Machine washable and stain-resistant, our fabulous selection of vibrant colors won’t fade after washing. The Nestl Bed Skirt is the perfect solution to hide underbed storage and complement your bedding!

EASY CARE & CLEANING: Machine wash in cold water and tumble dry on low. Fade, stain, shrink and wrinkle resistant. Nestl Bed Skirts are easy to iron, as well as hypoallergenic, anti-bacterial, environmentally friendly and resistant to dust mites. Resistant to pilling and snagging, our bedding is pet-friendly, durable and made to last!

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Welcome to the Nestl Bedding family! Every purchase includes a 100% money-back satisfaction guarantee. Our #1 goal is to provide you with unparalleled customer service and we’re only happy if our customers are happy! Shop with confidence because no matter what, we’ve got you covered!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars6,601 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
